metadata.title: CVE-2023-3727 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to 115.0.5790.98 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
